about_the_game:
In this demo, you will be in charge of a capital-island. Manage its resources and population, and develop it by aggregating island’s shards of various biomes and sizes. Explore a procedurally generated world made of archipelagos of floating islands and expand your kingdom.

The demo only covers the early game and is limited to 80 turns which represent about 2 hours of gameplay.

short_description: Myriads: Renaissance is a turn-based strategy game with city-building and 4X mechanics. Set in a fantasy world made up of thousands of floating islands, build your capital island, extend your kingdom and overcome a powerful enemy.
